profileAlternative.name: Nikki Mukkala

profileAlternative.summary:
• Program manager with a strong engineering background and proven experience in leading, coordinating & executing projects.
• Robust technical experience in product design, machine design, 3D modeling, finite element analysis and manufacturing processes.


Modeling Softwares: Solidworks, Inventor, AutoCAD, Pro/E

positions.title: Project Engineer
positions.description:
• Design and develop beverage dispensing equipment for Cornelius PepsiCo segment. Primary Modelling tool: Pro/E
• Led multiple projects while efficiently collaborating with cross-functional team to release products to the market....

positions.title: Mechanical Design Engineer
positions.description:
• Designed and developed roofing shingle manufacturing lines.
• Developed strong expertise with AutoDesk Inventor Professional 2014, AutoDesk Vault Workgroup 2014, AutoCAD Mechanical 2014 in the development of 3D models of machinery, analysis and detailed drawings....

positions.title: Intern- Design Engineer
positions.description:
• Research in understanding Environmental test systems in Automotive Applications
• Improved the design of an Environmental Chamber for automotive testing and created a 3D Model using Solidworks
• Performed Structural and Thermal Analysis using ANSYS...

positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant
positions.companyName: NIDRR- Engineering Research center at UIC
positions.description:

• Developed the 3D model using PRO/E.
